questions.text: Was our representative courteous and polite?
Which ONE of the following statements BEST describes the way you feel about R.J Reynolds' response to your request for assistance?
Based on the service you received, will you continue to purchase the brand of cigarettes you contacted us about?
Based on the service you received, would you recommend this brand of cigarettes to an adult smoker (21 years of age or older) who currently smokes a competitive brand?
